com.parkit.parkingsystem.dao

Class ParkingSpotDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkit.parkingsystem.dao.ParkingSpotDAO

  • public class ParkingSpotDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    ParkingSpotDAO class is built to stock ParkingSpot Data.

    DAO means "Data Access Object". It is use to separate how we stock data with the main code. So if stocking Data method change, only functional class will have be to changed.

    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Frederic VO
    See Also:
    DataBaseConfig, DBConstants, ParkingType, ParkingSpot

    • Method Detail

      • getNextAvailableSlot

        public int getNextAvailableSlot(ParkingType parkingType)
        getNextAvailableSlot() is built to get the next available slot in parking from DataBase in MySQL. In a try/catch/finally instruction, it will :
        • getConnection from Database in MySQL
        • use prepareStatement of getting next parking slot
        • run query
        • close ResultSet
        • close PreparedStatement
        • return the next available spot if no error
        • close connection
        Parameters:
        parkingType - Parking type of vehicle
        Returns:
        result
        Since:
        1.0

      • updateParking

        public boolean updateParking(ParkingSpot parkingSpot)
        updateParking() is built to update parking after changed from DataBase in MySQL. In a try/catch/finally instruction, it will :
        • getConnection from Database in MySQL
        • use prepareStatement of updating parking spot
        • run update
        • close PreparedStatement
        • return updating row
        • close connection
        Parameters:
        parkingSpot - Parking spot with ID, type and isAvailable
        Returns:
        updateRowCount
        Since:
        1.0
